title: Why digital voter suppression is so hard to stop
description:
Voter suppression online is more complicated than just posting misleading information about the election. Vox senior video producer Joss Fong, explains why it’s hard to spot on social media and how digital voter suppression disproportionately targets Black voters. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: Why digital voter suppression is so hard to stop
itunes:author: Recode
itunes:subtitle: What we’ve learned from the 2016 election.
